turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'm going to be driving home. And, I want to pick up some pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two with onion and tomato, one with sausage, one with ham.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 gluten free crust pizzas, 2 with onion and tomatoes, 1 sausage, and 1 ham, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, for a pickup as soon as possible.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $57 and your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent. Thank you for your help.
